title: [Vilhra's Outfitting]
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A plain wooden table sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the tufted velveteen walls.  An intricately carved ebonwood stand and a plain wooden table sit in opposite corners while a wyvern painted ivory vase rests on a dark mahogany floor.
